feature.label: iSphere for RDi 9.5.1.3+ (recommended)
feature.description: iSphere for RDi 9.5.1.3+ The "iSphere RSE Feature (RDi)" delivers services that are specific to RDi. It completely relies on and extends the iSphere Core Feature regarding to RDi.
